name: Run 'n' Yum!
description:
Good news! You can eat whatever you want! 

But there's a twist;
Eating unhealthy food might make you slower, and your health go worse in long term even though it makes your hunger gone in short term while healthy food actually makes you run faster.






 Use WASD / Arrow Keys
To Move  







Everything except the SFX and the music is made by Gamezerkers aka Sanzu and SaucyBoi in 48 hours for GAMEHIGHED Jam 2021
